summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Rev-Box Data Management platform. Successfully verified login flow, dashboard stats, navigation between all new pages (Data Sources, Staging Area, Conflict Resolution, Table Linking, Approved Data), and core functionality. All major UI components are working correctly with proper data display and user interactions.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Agent creation fails due to duplicate agent code
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Use unique agent codes for testing

ui_bugs.issue: Session timeout occurs frequently during navigation
ui_bugs.selector: Login form reappears after short periods

passed_tests: User login flow with test@example.com / test123 credentials
Dashboard loads with correct stats (2 Data Sources, 845 In Staging, 4193 Conflicts, 3 Approved Records)
Navigation sidebar displays all new Rev-Box pages correctly
Data Sources page shows 2 sources (Test Insurance Company, Foremost) with Add Source button
Configure Mappings links available for field mapping configuration
Staging Area page displays uploads list with file details and conflict counts
Upload filtering by source functionality present
Recent uploads section shows processed files with status indicators
Quick Actions section with Upload Data, Resolve Conflicts, Link Tables
Conflict Resolution page accessible via direct navigation
Table Linking page accessible with source selection interface
Approved Data page accessible and loads correctly
Rev-Box branding and UI theme consistent across all pages
Backend API endpoints working (93.3% success rate)
Data persistence and retrieval functioning correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider implementing longer session timeout or session refresh mechanism to improve user experience during extended navigation. The session expiry issue is minor but affects usability during longer workflows.
